afterEach.description: afterEach function is called once after each spec

beforeEach.description: beforeEach function is called once before each spec

callsAll.description: returns the context (the this) and arguments passed all calls

callsAllArgs.description: returns the arguments to all calls

callsAny.description: returns false if the spy has not been called at all, and then true once at least one call happens

callsArgsFor.description: returns the arguments passed to call number index

callsCount.description: returns the number of times the spy was called

callsFirst.description: returns the context (the this) and arguments for the first call

callsMostRescent.description: returns the context (the this) and arguments for the most recent call

callsReset.description: clears all tracking for a spy

createSpyObject.description: creates a mock with multiple spies

expext.description: takes a value, called the actual.

any.description: akes a constructor or “class” name as an expected value. It returns true if the constructor matches the constructor of the actual value

objectContaining.description: when an expectation only cares about certain key/value pairs in the actual

notToBe.description: expects an object - value not to be equal

notToBleCloseTo.description: expects a value not to be close to another value

notToBeDefined.description: expects the argument is not defined

notToBeFalsef.description: expects the argument not to be false

notToBeGreaterThan.description: expects the argument not to be greater than

notToBeLessThanlt.description: expects the argument not to be less than

notToBeNull.description: expects the argument not to be null

notToBeTruthy.description: expects the argument not to be truthy

notToBeUndefined.description: expects the argument not to be undefined

notToContain.description: expects the array does not contain the argument

notToEqual.description: expects the first argument not to be equal to the second one

notToMatch.description: expects the first argument not to match the second one

notToThrow.description: expects the argument not to throw

spyOnAndCallFake.description: all calls to the spy will delegate to the supplied function

spyOnAndCallThrough.description: tracks all calls to it and delegates to the actual implementation

spyOnAndReturnValue.description: all calls to the function will return a specific value

spyOnAndStub.description: The original stubbing behavior is returned at any time

spyOnAndThrowError.description: all calls to the spy will throw the specified value as an error

spyOnProperty get.description: Install a spy on a property onto an existing object with get accessType

spyOnProperty set.description: Install a spy on a property onto an existing object with set accessType

spyOn.description: creates a spy for the specified method

toBe.description: expects the first argument to be equal with the second one

toBeCloseTo.description: expects the first argument to be close to the second one base on the delta

toBeGreaterThan.description: expects the argument is greater than

toBeLessThan.description: expects the argument is less than

toContain.description: expects the array contains the argument

toEqual.description: expects the first argument to be equal with the second one

toHaveBeenCalled.description: returns true if the spy was called

toHaveBeenCalledWith.description: he toHaveBeenCalled matcher will return true if the argument list matches any of the recorded calls to the spy

toMatch.description: returns true if the argument matches the second value

toThrow.description: expects that the specified method will throw

toThrowError.description: expects that the specified method will throw with the specified error

xDescribe.description: these suites and any specs inside them are skipped when run and thus their results will not appear in the results

xIt.description: pending specs do not run, but their names will show up in the results as pending
